summary: "Some Like It Hot" is a funny 1959 movie directed by Billy Wilder, starring Marilyn Monroe, Tony Curtis, and Jack Lemmon. Two musicians dress up as women to hide from gangsters after witnessing a crime. The film was very popular and is now seen as one of the best movies ever made. It was nominated for six Academy Awards and won for Best Costume Design. Even though it broke some rules about showing people dressed as the opposite gender, its success helped end those old movie rules.
title: Some Like It Hot
